Name: Sailor's Comfort
Ingredients: 30 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Lime, peach and hints of berry make a light, easy drink.
History: Discovered in 2002 at Lightship Ten, London.
Nutrition: One serving of Sailor's Comfort contains 154 calories
